name: fso
description: fso - FileSystemObject is a objective fs interface like Pathname(ruby)

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.dist: shx rm -rf dist && tsc --allowJs --target es3 --sourceMap --outDir dist/lib src/lib/fso.js && shx cp src/lib/*.d.ts dist/lib
scripts.docdist: cd doc && git clean -fd && git rm -rf * && cd .. && npm run doc && cd doc && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -m doc && git push
scripts.doc: typedoc --mode file --out doc --disableOutputCheck --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported src && cd doc && git status && cd ..
